name: Fateshift
description:
"I can help you get stronger... For a price."

Fateshift is a small game developed in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44. In this combat simulator, defeat monsters and bosses in a dark dungeon, all the while making deals with a demon to trade your life for powerful items that can help you go further in the dungeon. See how long you can survive!

Developed by Starbit Software

Doug Lima @douglma - Programming, game design, animation, visual effects

Ligia Assis @ailaghast - 3D art, 2D art, sound

Change Log Post Jam:
  •  Fix for the item icons and abilities icons.
  •  Bug fixes on the parry and block systems.
  •  Balance improvements.
  •  Item description and effects are now showing on the trade screen.
  • Animation canceling fixed
